divs: sighting detailshi i am from india , and recently i came to know about the daily ufo sighting at particular place and at particular time in india , my request is that please look into this matter and i am sure that this is gonna biggest thing ever... details about the area in india and article by an indian press http:\\www.indiadaily.com\editorial\01-09a-05.asp google earth address link for that spot:-http:\\bbs.keyhole.com\ubb\ubbthreads.php?ubb=download&number=715149&filename=1200592-ufohotspotkongkala.kmz also a controversial statement by former indian foreign affair minister on aliens :- http:\\www.indiadaily.com\editorial\01-06a-05.asp i am requesting to investigate in this area coz here in india no one will invest fund and time in this topic coz of their livelihood and other dailylife problems. thanks
